title: mris_volmask_vtk
description: Computes a volume mask at the resolution of the brain.mgz file, containing labels for various brain structures using surface files.

cap_distance.title: Cap Distance
cap_distance.description: Maximum distance up to which the signed distance function computation is accurate.

label_background.title: Background Label
label_background.description: Override the default background label value (0).

label_left_white.title: Left White Matter Label
label_left_white.description: Override the default left white matter label (20).

label_left_ribbon.title: Left Ribbon Label
label_left_ribbon.description: Override the default left ribbon label (10).

label_right_white.title: Right White Matter Label
label_right_white.description: Override the default right white matter label (120).

label_right_ribbon.title: Right Ribbon Label
label_right_ribbon.description: Override the default right ribbon label (110).

surf_white.title: White Surface Name
surf_white.description: Surface root name for white matter surfaces (default: white).

surf_pial.title: Pial Surface Name
surf_pial.description: Surface root name for pial surfaces (default: pial).

aseg_name.title: Aseg Name
aseg_name.description: Specify a different name for the aseg input file (default: aseg).

out_root.title: Output Root
out_root.description: Output root name (default: ribbon) for generated output files.

subjects_dir.title: Subjects Directory
subjects_dir.description: Specify the SUBJECTS_DIR, default is read from environment.

save_distance.title: Save Distance Function Flag
save_distance.description: Option to save the signed distance function.

parallel.title: Parallel Processing Flag
parallel.description: Run hemispheres in parallel and combine the result.

edit_aseg.title: Edit Aseg Flag
edit_aseg.description: Edit the aseg using the ribbons and save it.

save_ribbon.title: Save Ribbon Flag
save_ribbon.description: Save only the ribbon for the hemispheres.
